T02D2834:178a-0: @178a * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po ye shes 'bebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2834:178a-2: mgon po mi rtog bde chen ster mdzad sku //
T02D2834:178a-3: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'dzin bcas brgyud dang bltas //
T02D2834:178a-4: spyi bo nas brtsegs ye shes phreng ba dang //
T02D2834:178a-5: gzhu nyid pad zlas ye shes 'khor lo 'bar bar 'gyur //
T02D2834:178a-6: shin tu gus bcas gtong ba che //
T02D2834:178a-7: bzod ldan the tshom med rtog bral //
T02D2834:178a-8: g-yeng ba spangs shing dbang po dul //
T02D2834:178a-9: slob ma de ni rjes su bzung //
T02D2834:178a-10: sna tshogs padma ge sar ldan //
T02D2834:178a-11: ze'u 'bru rdo rje me phreng gis //
T02D2834:178a-12: legs spras byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbus //
T02D2834:178a-13: skal ldan bzhag la bgegs bskrad bya //
T02D2834:178a-14: aom a'a:bi gh'anta krita h'um phat /
T02D2834:178a-15: bdug pa mchog gis rab bdug cing //
T02D2834:178a-16: me tog dmar po gcal bkram la //
T02D2834:178a-17: mar me 'bar ba du ma yis //
T02D2834:178a-18: kun nas khor yug bskor bar bya //
T02D2834:178b-0: bdag @178b nyid lhag pa'i lha'i nga rgyal du byas la /
T02D2834:178b-1: rdo rje la ni yam rlung gi shugs can no //
T02D2834:178b-2: de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2834:178b-3: gtsug tor du ham thig le'i snying po can no //
T02D2834:178b-4: de ni 'jig rten mgon po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2834:178b-5: steng na 'dzag pas ni mi 'grib bo //
T02D2834:178b-6: smin mtshams nas gri 'phros pas ni slob ma la 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2834:178b-7: slob ma'i 'og tu ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2834:178b-8: de ni sbyor ba 'og mas bskyod par byed do //
T02D2834:178b-9: sprul pa ni yang lha mo nyid do //
T02D2834:178b-10: de ni sbyor ba par mas sbyor bar byed do //
T02D2834:178b-11: snying gar ni yang bde gshegs snying po nyid do //
T02D2834:178b-12: de ni sbyor pa gong mas 'bebs par byed do //
T02D2834:178b-13: spyi bor ni yang mgon po'o//
T02D2834:178b-14: de ni sbyor pa thog mas 'bebs par byed do //
T02D2834:178b-15: ma phebs na spogs pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D2834:178b-16: rdo rje sna bug gi sbyor bas so //
T02D2834:178b-17: shin tu spogs pa ni rdo rje spyi gtsug gi sbyor bas so //
T02D2834:178b-18: babs par gyur na spu 'greng zhing //
T02D2834:178b-19: gdong bsgyur 'od gsal ba nyid dang //
T02D2834:178b-20: brjod par mi nus yang na gtso //
T02D2834:178b-21: mi rtog bde bas myos par 'gyur //
